channel.title: Yutian Tang's News
channel.description: News from Yutian Tang's work and research
channel.generator: Feeder 3 3.5.10(3072); Mac OS X Version 10.13.4 (Build 17E199) http://reinventedsoftware.com/feeder/

item.title: Paper Accepted to ISSRE (Industry Track)
item.description: One paper entitled "A Smart Context-aware Program Assistant based on Dynamic Programming Event Modeling" has been accepted to ISSRE 2018 Industry Track.

item.title: Paper Accepted to ICPC 2017
item.description: Our paper entitled "Constructing feature model by identifying variability-aware modules." has been accepted to ICPC 2017!

item.title: Defended my Ph.D. thesis
item.description: I successfully defended my thesis today!

item.title: Paper Accepted to ICPC 2018
item.description: One paper entitled "Cross Version Defect Prediction with Representative Data via Sparse Subset Selection" has been accepted to ICPC 2018!
